4305770.name: Male Shrine Maiden Heart-Fluttering Short RPG
4305770.description:
*Synopsis

Aoi Shirayuki, a crossdressing shrine maiden, works diligently at Momokuri Shrine.

One day, the head shrine maiden, Momoko Momokuri, gives her a special task:

to acquire Moneko, a mysterious creature with the genes of both a cat and a peach.

Thus begins Aoi's shrine maiden training.

*Heartwarming, All-Ages Story of a Crossdressing Shrine Maiden

Almost every character is a crossdressing boy in kimono or shrine maiden attire.

The game focuses on charming and humorous interactions between characters,

creating a lighthearted, heartwarming experience suitable for all ages.

*Simple, Easy-to-Play RPG

This is a short RPG with only three maps and no need for leveling up.

There are no weapons or armor.

By removing equipment, the game is kept simple and straightforward.

The focus is on character interactions rather than combat.

*Event CGs

There are 12 illustrations (excluding variations).

*Play Time

Approximately 20 minutes.

*All Illustrations Accessible Without Playing

This game does not include a CG gallery mode.

Instead, all in-game illustrations are included in the accompanying

"Peach cat Illustrations" folder.

Production

Doujin Circle: Kimirinko.

Scenario

Aya Kuchitani

In-Game Illustrations

Created using AI generation (NovelAI) and then manually refined

Momo Momokuri Character Sprites and Chibi Illustrations

Original artwork by Aya Kuchitani

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
